meanings.definition: To support or confirm the validity or accuracy of something.
meanings.sent1: I can vouch for my friend's honesty.
meanings.sent2: She always vouches for the quality of this product.
meanings.sent3: I vouch that the cat can speak English!
meanings.sent4: Her smile vouched for her happiness.
meanings.sent5: The shining stars vouch for the beauty of the night sky.

meanings.definition: To give a guarantee or assurance.
meanings.sent1: I vouch that the package will arrive on time.
meanings.sent2: He vouches to fix the issue by tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: I vouch that the sun will rise from the west tomorrow!
meanings.sent4: His signature vouched for the authenticity of the document.
meanings.sent5: The loud thunder vouches for the approaching storm.

meanings.definition: To assert or declare as a fact.
meanings.sent1: She vouches that she saw a ghost last night.
meanings.sent2: He vouches that he will win the race.
meanings.sent3: I vouch that unicorns exist in the backyard!
meanings.sent4: The old map vouched for the buried treasure.
meanings.sent5: The roaring lion vouches for its dominance in the jungle.
